General.Name: Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chularat Hospital Public Company Limited operates clinics and hospitals in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Hospital Operations and Other Businesses. The company also distributes medical instruments and dietary supplement products. It operates branches of clinics and hospitals. The company was founded in 1986 is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 88/8-9, Teparak Km. 15 Road, Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10540

6.Name: Ms. Wandee  Pisanuvanavech
